General.Name: ANEK Lines S.A. Pfd. 96
General.Description: Anonimi Naftiliaki Etairia Kritis SA engages in the maritime transport services in Greece. It provides passenger and cargo transportation through 7 privately-owned vessels and 1 chartered vessel operating primarily in the routes of the Aegean, Adriatic Sea, Crete, Dodecanese, and Cyclades. The company also offers tourism and consulting services. Anonimi Naftiliaki Etairia Kritis SA was incorporated in 1967 and is based in Chania, Greece.
